metadata.title: Multidimensional scaling analysis of virus diseases

abstract.original_text: Background and Objective: Viruses are infectious agents that replicate inside organisms and reveal a plethora of distinct characteristics. Viral infections spread in many ways, but often have devastating consequences and represent a huge danger for public health. It is important to design statistical and computational techniques capable of handling the available data and highlighting the most important features.

sentences.segment_text: Background and Objective : Viruses are infectious agents that replicate inside organisms and reveal a plethora of distinct characteristics .
Viral infections spread in many ways ,
but often have devastating consequences and represent a huge danger for public health .
It is important to design statistical and computational techniques capable of handling the available data and highlighting the most important features .

abstract.original_text: Methods: This paper reviews the quantitative and qualitative behaviour of 22 infectious diseases caused by viruses. The information is compared and visualized by means of the multidimensional scaling technique.

sentences.segment_text: Methods : This paper reviews the quantitative and qualitative behaviour of 22 infectious diseases caused by viruses .
The information is compared and visualized by means of the multidimensional scaling technique .

abstract.original_text: The results are robust to uncertainties in the data and revealed to be consistent with clinical practice.

sentences.segment_text: The results are robust to uncertainties in the data and revealed to be consistent with clinical practice .

abstract.original_text: The paper shows that the proposed methodology may represent a solid mathematical tool to tackle a larger number of virus and additional information about these infectious agents. c o m p u t e r m e t h o d s a n d p r o g r a m s i n b i o m e d i c i n e 1 3 1 ( 2 0 1 6 ) 9 7 -1 1 0 j o u r n a l h o m e p a g e : w w w. i n t l . e l s e v i e r h e a l t h . c o m / j o u r n a l s / c m p b
